name: Temple Escape (itch) (Vincent Titterton)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • R to reload your most recent checkpoint.

Tips:

  • Don’t push anything into a wall that you want to be able to push away from that wall.
  • It may be helpful to only press directions once rather than holding a direction, to avoid accidental inputs that result in an untimely fall.
  • Anything that moves onto ice will continue moving until it hits a solid object or a hole. The player can choose a new direction to slide in after coming to a stop on ice.
  • Objects that fall into holes still count as solid for the time they are falling. Use this to maneuver on ice with dispensable objects you intentionally push into holes.
